1.content:
Twenty-three year old Sally Watson was in her bed sleeping until she suddenly felt her dog Timmy pulling at her short pink night dress and said, "Ok,Ok,I'm up," as she then got of bed and went to have a shower.

The now concerned and slightly frustrated young blond then tried to push and wiggle herself free again,even putting her left foot against the tree trunk for more leverage but still she just wouldn't budge and was hit with the realisation that she was in fact completely and utterly stuck in the tree trunk.

The young woman thought about calling Laura or Bernadette but remembered that her phone was outside in her bag and called out, "Help,could someone please help me,I'm stuck,help," but no one was nearby to hear her voice as she realised that she should probably get comfy because she wouldn't be going anywhere anytime soon.

Timmy soon found Bernadette,a thin blond and tried to get her to follow him but she didn't understand what the dog despite him pulling the hem of her short pink dress with white spots as she said, "Timmy,stop pulling at my dress like that,it's very naughty."

111111111.content:
Sally's face turned beet red with embarrassment as she realised that the sheep had pulled off the seat of her skirt and the back of her tights,exposing her bubble butt which was barely covered by pink panties with tiny teddy bears on them.

"This is the most embarrassing day of my life but at least,it can't possibly get any worse," said the young blond as someone drew a smiley face on her panties before taking a picture then ran off as a bird began pecking at her now exposed booty.

"Me and my big mouth," said Sally as she began laughing at the ridiculousness of her current predicament.

The young woman had now been stuck for more than an hour and said, "I think I'm going to be stuck here forever," before suddenly
111111111.title: A RIP sound was suddenly heard!

1111111111.content:
Sally then remembered that her dog whistle was in her jacket pocket and after realising that if she had used it earlier,she wouldn't be in this mess,took it out of her jacket pocket and blew it,hoping her dog would hear it.

Bernadette had taken Timmy to see Laura,a thin brunette and along the way had bumped into her and Sally's close friends Rebecca and Clara,her best friend's sister Sinead and Sinead's daughter Lilly but absolutely no one could figure out what the dog wanted.

Timmy then heard the whistle and ran back to his owner as Laura said, "Follow that dog," as everyone ran as fast as they could.

Everyone soon arrived and burst into laughter when they saw Sally's barely-covered behind sticking out of the tree trunk.

The humiliated young woman then explained the entire situation as her wife said, "Aw,you poor thing,don't worry,I'll pull you out," as she then grabbed onto Sally's hips and pulled and pulled with all her might for several minutes without any success until she lost her grip and tumbled backwards onto the grass.

Bernadette and Rebecca helped the young brunette back to her feet as she said, "It's no good,she just simply won't budge,I don't know how on earth we are going to get her out of there?"
1111111111.title: Remembering that her dog whistle was in her jac...

choices: "All right everyone,Heave," said Laura.
11111111111.content:
The young girl then said, "This is just like the enormous turnip story Sally reads to me,so maybe if everyone forms a chain behind her and pulls really hard just like in the story,she just might actually budge.

Everyone praised Lilly as Sally said," That's an absolutely perfect idea,Laura,grab onto my hips. "

Laura then grabbed onto her wife's hips,Bernadette pulled Laura's waist,Rebecca pulled Bernadette's legs,Clara pulled Rebecca's t-shirt and Sinead pulled Clara's waist.

Lilly then asked, "Mom,can I help?"

Sinead replied, "Of course,you can,darling,grab onto my hem of my dress and just pull as hard as you can," as her daughter then grabbed onto the hem of her dress.
11111111111.title: Lilly then had an idea!

111111111111.content:
As the epic tug of war with the tree trunk over her wife began.
"OW,that really hurts," said Sally as she still wouldn't budge a single inch.
"Heave," said the young brunette as everyone pulled and pulled even harder.
"OW,OH,OW,this is ridiculous,I think I'm going to be pulled in two," said the young woman as still the tree trunk refused to let her leave.
"Come on everyone,we can actually do this,really put your backs into it,heave," said Laura as everyone pulled,tugged and heaved with all their strength as the bird began pulling at the front of her wife's t-shirt.

Timmy began pulling at the hem of Lilly's skirt as his poor owner was streched to her absolute limit until finally,a POP sound was suddenly heard.

Sally was pulled from the hole in the tree trunk at last,sending everyone tumbling backwards into a heap on the grass as Timmy looked on.

"Thank goodness for that,I'm finally free,I thought I might be stuck in there forever," as she hugged and kissed her wife before hugging her friends,her sister,Lilly and her dog,who licked her face before thanking everyone for helping her out.

"It was absolutely no problem,nice panties by the way,especially the smiley face,very cute," joked a laughing Bernadette.

The young blond then remembered that everyone could see her underwear and quickly used her denim jacket to cover the hole in her skirt and tights before taking everyone for something to eat to say thank you for rescuing her as they all laughed at the ridiculousness of the entire situation.

Sally did have her dishes then went downstairs to the basement and spent nearly an hour cleaning it.

The young woman was almost finished when she moved a large wardrobe and was absolutely shocked to discover a rather small hole in the wall.

"I wonder what's in there," said Sally as she thought about entering the hole but wondered if she would actually fit.
